title: FIFA - Wikipedia
snippet: The President and the Secretary General are the main office holders of FIFA and are in charge of its daily administration, carried in by the general secretariat, with its staff of approximately 280 members. title: Gianni Infantino’s Trump problem - POLITICO
snippet: Infantino launched his first campaign for FIFA’s presidency as an underdog. A corruption scandal had toppled much of FIFA’s leadership in 2015, forcing a so-called “extraordinary congress” the next year in which members would vote to decide who would complete the unfinished term vacated by the newly suspended president Sepp Blatter...

title: Sepp Blatter eviscerates Gianni Infantino over Trump, Ronaldo and Saudi Arabia
